titleStmt.title: The humble petition of the inhabitants of the county of Suffolke: presented to the Right Honourable the House of Peers, on Tuesday the 16. of February, 1646. With their answer thereunto. Die. Mercurij 29 Febr. 1646. Ordered by the Lords assembled in Parliament, that this petition and answer be forthwith printed and published. Jo. Brown Cler. Parliamentorum.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Lords.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Wright at the Kings Head in the old Bayley.,

notesStmt.note: "In favour of the Presbyterian Government of the Church"--Thomason Catalogue.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
